==Trivia==
* During [[The Almighty Arataki Great and Glorious Drumalong Festival]], an event from [[Version 2.7]], the most popular music score was ''Blossoms of Summer Night'' which accounted for 23.96% of the total number of music score challenges. This data was collected from all servers outside Mainland China.<ref>Twitter: [https://twitter.com/genshinimpact/status/1546675714690252802 Teyvat Times - Vol. 3]</ref>
